annotation.message: An operand identifier [reference] is hiding another identifier of the same name.

An operand identifier [reference] is hiding another identifier of the same name.

a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTMeaslesLowTxLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Measles.Low transmission) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a measles vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: Countries with low levels of measles transmission (countries that provide first dose of measles-containing vaccine (MCV) at 12 months and second dose of MCV at 15 months) * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTMeaslesLowTxLogic

def.name: Today
Patient
Patient
Client is not due for MCV1 Case 1

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for MCV1 Case 1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

expression.name: Client's age is less than 12 months

def.name: Client is not due for MCV1 Case 2

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for MCV1 Case 2

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

a:s.a:s: "No measles primary series doses were administered"
"Client's age is more than or equal to 12 months"
"Live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks"

operand.name: No measles primary series doses were administered
Client's age is more than or equal to 12 months
Live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks

def.name: Client is not due for MCV1

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for MCV1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for MCV1 Case 1"
"Client is not due for MCV1 Case 2"

operand.name: Client is not due for MCV1 Case 1
Client is not due for MCV1 Case 2

def.name: Client is not due for MCV1 Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for MCV1 Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with MCV1 as client's age is less than 12 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV1.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with MCV1 as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV1.

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for MCV1 Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client with MCV1 as client\'s age is less than 12 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV1.'
"Client is not due for MCV1 Case 2"
'Should not vaccinate client with MCV1 as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV1.'

when.name: Client is not due for MCV1 Case 1

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with MCV1 as client's age is less than 12 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV1.

when.name: Client is not due for MCV1 Case 2

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with MCV1 as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV1.

def.name: Client is due for MCV1

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for MCV1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

a:s.a:s: "No measles primary series doses were administered"
"Client's age is more than or equal to 12 months"
"No live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks"

operand.name: No measles primary series doses were administered
Client's age is more than or equal to 12 months
No live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks

def.name: Client is due for MCV1 Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for MCV1 Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with MCV1 as no measles doses were administered, client is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.

a:s.a:s: 'Should vaccinate client with MCV1 as no measles doses were administered, client is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.'

expression.value: Should vaccinate client with MCV1 as no measles doses were administered, client is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.

'Should not vaccinate client with MCV2 as client\'s age is less than 15 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV2.'
"Client is not due for MCV2 Case 2"
'Should not vaccinate client with MCV2 as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV2.'

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

a:s.a:s: "Client's age is more than or equal to 15 months"
"No live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks"

No live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks

def.name: Client is due for MCV2 Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for MCV2 Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with MCV2 as client is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.

a:s.a:s: 'Should vaccinate client with MCV2 as client is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.'

expression.value: Should vaccinate client with MCV2 as client is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.

def.name: Measles primary series is complete

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Measles primary series is complete

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Measles-containing vaccines")

def.name: Measles primary series is complete Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Measles primary series is complete Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Measles primary series is complete. Two measles primary series doses were administered. Check if a measles supplementary dose is appropriate for the client.

a:s.a:s: 'Measles primary series is complete. Two measles primary series doses were administered. Check if a measles supplementary dose is appropriate for the client.'

expression.value: Measles primary series is complete. Two measles primary series doses were administered. Check if a measles supplementary dose is appropriate for the client.

def.name: Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for MCV1 Guidance"
"Client is not due for MCV2 Guidance"

when.name: Client is not due for MCV1

then.name: Client is not due for MCV1 Guidance
Client is due for MCV1 Guidance

when.name: Client is not due for MCV2

then.name: Client is not due for MCV2 Guidance
Client is due for MCV2 Guidance
Measles primary series is complete Guidance

def.name: Has Guidance
Test Validation

a:t.name: test
a:t.value: Test expected results based on example patients

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for MCV1 Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client with MCV1 as client\'s age is less than 12 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV1.'

'Should vaccinate client with MCV1 as no measles doses were administered, client is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for MCV1 Case 2"
'Should not vaccinate client with MCV1 as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV1.'
"Client is not due for MCV2 Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client with MCV2 as client\'s age is less than 15 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV2.'
'Should vaccinate client with MCV2 as client is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for MCV2 Case 2"
'Should not vaccinate client with MCV2 as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV2.'
'Measles primary series is complete. Two measles primary series doses were administered. Check if a measles supplementary dose is appropriate for the client.'

operand.value: Should not vaccinate client with MCV1 as client's age is less than 12 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV1.

operand.name: Client is not due for MCV1 Case 2

operand.value: Should not vaccinate client with MCV1 as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV1.

operand.value: Should not vaccinate client with MCV2 as client's age is less than 15 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV2.

Measles primary series is complete. Two measles primary series doses were administered. Check if a measles supplementary dose is appropriate for the client.
